It is important to recognize that every new dollar per citizen invested in the Ontario Digital Library has a  double benefit: it supports a province-wide library of high quality information resources and it  strengthens every local library in Ontario by allowing them to reinvest existing dollars in new resources
that enhance local services.  This multiplier means that for every dollar invested in ODL the return  on investment is worth $2 of value for Ontario.
